==Links of Interest== ===Forums=== *[http://www.zero13wireless.net/foro/showthread.php?6603-SMCWUSBS-N-EZ-Connect%ED%A2%E2%80%9E%C2%A2-N-Draft-11n On '''zero13wireless.net'''] (some low-res shots of the dongle + board) :00:13:F7 OUI ===Misc.=== *[http://www.ubuntu-es.org/index.php?q=node/109875 On '''ubuntu-es.org'''] :The USB ID was noted here. 083a is also an '''Accton''' / '''Arcadyan''' VID, so they are the presumed manuf. of this device. :This device is using either RT2770+RT2720 or RT2870+RT2820.
[[Category:English Documentation]]
